text: On the evening of 2 September 2019, a bomb on a tractor killed 16 people and injured 119 others at a housing compound used by international organisations in Kabul, Afghanistan.16 dead in Taliban blast in Afghan capital The target of the attack was foreign citizens living in the town; five Nepalis, two Britons and a 43-year-old Romanian diplomat were killed in the attack.Eight Foreign Nationals Killed In Taliban Attack In Kabul Twenty-five other foreign residents were wounded, including another Romanian.Romania Hails ‘Hero’ Diplomat Killed in Afghan Terror Attack On 5 September 2019, at least 12 people, including an American service member and a Romanian soldier,NATO says US, Romanian soldiers killed in Kabul were killed and more than 40 injured when a suicide car bomber exploded in a heavily fortified area of central Kabul, close to the Afghan security offices. The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attacks.US, Romanian Soldiers Killed In Kabul Attack == References == 2 and 5 September bombings Category:2019 murders in Afghanistan 2 and 5 September 2019 bombings Category:21st-century mass murder in Afghanistan 2 and 5 September 2019 bombings Category:Mass murder in 2019 2 and 5 September 2019 bombings Category:September 2019 crimes in Asia Category:September 2019 events in Afghanistan Category:Suicide bombings in 2019 2 and 5 September 2019 Category:Suicide car and truck bombings in Afghanistan Category:Taliban attacks
title: 2 and 5 September 2019 Kabul bombings
